SkillLevelProgress.name: SkillLevelProgress
SkillLevelProgress.description: Represents training progress for a given user.

CompletedCount.description: Number of modules that have been completed towards this Skill Mapping.

CompletedDate.description: The date when this progress was completed.

OwnerId.description: The owner of skill level progress.

ServiceResourceId.description: The Service Resource that will be granted a service resource skill when the progress is complete.

SkillLevelDefinitionId.description: The corresponding skill mapping for this progress.

SkillMasterLabel.description: The master label of the Skill associated with the associated SkillLevelDefinition.

Status.description: Represents the status of the progress.

TotalCount.description: The total number of modules that need to be completed.
